data.meta_description: There are so many fun things to do in Astoria Oregon this year! Start by booking your room at our bed and breakfast near Long Beach, WA.
data.text:
There are so many great things to do in Astoria, Oregon! That’s why it’s one of our favorite day trips from our bed and breakfast near Long Beach, WA. It’s a quick 25-minute drive, including the iconic four-mile Astoria-Megler Bridge, into the charming small town on the banks of the Columbia River. You’ll find fantastic historical sites, unique museums, stunning nature areas, and award-winning restaurants, breweries, and coffee shops. There’s no shortage of adventures to discover!

Perhaps the most well-known landmark that’s put Astoria, Oregon, on the map is the Goonie’s House from the popular action-adventure film from 1985. There are multiple filming locations, including the Oregon Film Museum (the jailhouse in the movie), and one of the fun things to do in Astoria is to tour these iconic spots. You’ll find quite a few of them on our list below! For those who may not be familiar with the film, these locations still capture an era in history and come along with lots of great stories.
